Our freedom of religion, speech, press, peaceful assembly, and petition of our government are all protected in this 232-year-old document. These rights are the bedrock of our nation.
It also divides power between state and federal government. The Framers understood that most issues should be handled by state and local governments.

The Constitution provides the framework for the organization of our government â€“ a separation of powers between three co-equal branches - (legislative) Congress, (judicial) Supreme Court, and (executive) the President.
#OnThisDay 232 years ago, the Constitution of the United States was signed, establishing & recognizing the basic rights of EVERY American citizen, which is why we commemorate #ConstitutionDay.
